projects.projectName: Anti-Emulator plugin for cuckoodroid using Frida
projects.description: Cuckoodroid is using to perform malware analysis for the android platform. The anti-emulator plugin is a key required to run since most malware behaviors aren't run in the emulator. This project attempts to observe the possibility to implement this feature with more emulation options.

projects.projectName: Tutoria - Tutor-broking system for university students
projects.description: It was a group assignment for a software engineering course in the 2nd semester and done in 2017. I was responsible for the booking system.

projects.projectName: SG airline app challenge for lounge services
projects.description: A demo application of personalized dining services: Tracking the utilization of space; Analyzing the dishes' nutritional content; Collecting data on meal consumption for improving customer experience.
